component.name: Mesa git Asahi snapshot
component.summary: Mesa - The 3D Graphics Library - Asahi builds

description.p: This extension contains the drivers part of Mesa3D library used by Asahi Linux. It's intended to be used together with libdrm and other graphics libraries from the corresponding Freedesktop SDK runtime and its derivatives. This is a development snapshot and there may be dragons. uABI/uAPI breakage is common, so you may need to constantly update.
